Name: Navigator
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This fruity, grapefruit-led drink is pleasantly bitter and sour.
History: Created in 2005 by Jamie Terrell, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Navigator contains 157 calories
